name: gephysio
label: CNI GE Physio File Converter
description: A tool to synchronize the physiological recording from GE scanners to the fMRI time series. Also filters the raw data and finds the peaks in PPG and respiratory waveform using the bandpass filter developed by Dora Hermes (see also https://github.com/vistalab/BrainBeat).

Snapshot.description: Flag for plotting segments of physio data. Generates a pdf file of three plots, each showing a snapshot of the data at the beginning, middle, end of the fMRI scan.

start_time.description: Starting time (ms) of the physio plot

window_length.description: Window width (ms) of the physio plot

author: Hua Wu
